subject: Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: At Shea Stadium, Bobby and Kevin Grogan painstakingly learned how to get to their seats, find a bathroom and buy a Coke. Now they had to learn those tasks again at Citi Field.
snippet: At Shea Stadium, Bobby and Kevin Grogan painstakingly learned how to get to their seats, find a bathroom and buy a Coke. Now they had to learn those tasks again at Citi Field.
